mapper.select: SELECT seat_address FROM field AS f, hall_dict AS d WHERE f.hall_id = d.UUID AND f.UUID =#{fieldId}

SELECT o.UUID AS orderId, h.film_name AS filmName, CONCAT('今天 ',DATE_FORMAT(o.order_time,'%m月%d日'),' ',f.begin_time)AS fieldTime, c.cinema_name AS cinemaName, o.seats_name AS seatsName, o.order_price AS orderPrice, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(o.order_time) AS orderTimestamp FROM `order` o, field f, hall_film_info h, cinema c WHERE o.cinema_id = c.UUID AND o.field_id = f.UUID AND o.film_id = h.film_id AND o.UUID = #{orderId}

SELECT o.UUID AS orderId, h.film_name AS filmName, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(o.order_time,'%y年%m月%d日'),' ',f.begin_time)AS fieldTime, c.cinema_name AS cinemaName, o.seats_name AS seatsName, o.order_price AS orderPrice, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(o.order_time) AS orderTimestamp FROM `order` o, field f, hall_film_info h, cinema c WHERE o.cinema_id = c.UUID AND o.field_id = f.UUID AND o.film_id = h.film_id AND o.order_user = #{userId}
